channel.title: Publications on Jianan Zhao's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Jianan Zhao's Homepage

item.title: Heterogeneous Graph Structure Learning for Graph Neural Networks
item.description: We propose a Heterogeneous Graph Structure Learning (HGSL) framework to learn optimal heterogeneous graph structures (for downstream tasks) for GNNs.

item.title: Network Schema Preserving Heterogeneous Information Network Embedding
item.description: We propose to preserve network schema proximity in heterogeneous information network embedding.
